Waited for Natera to leave work - but he must have got a ride
Went to hotel room - Natera not in his

Activity Notes: Interview = 55y, police in Globe for 6 y - knew nothing about how Carr, West & others conducting swindle but sure involved in fraud as suddenly have $ - knew nothing about letter, not in Lordsburg on 12th -Carr had asked to participate in dealseveral months earlier - several weeks ago, met Carr on street, introduced Walker as mine foreman - told by Alex boys that Walker also Carr's brother-in-law - Walker = 50-55y - Ireland promised to write if learned anything, keep interview confidential - seemed sincere - discontinued at 9:30 PM
